discover.title: Discover the World with Itinerar
discover.firstParagraph: Itinerar is your travel companion for exploring cities around the world. We create personalized itineraries featuring the most iconic tourist attractions, hidden gems, and must-visit places in any destination.
discover.secondParagraph: Whether you're planning a trip to Paris, exploring the streets of Rome, or relaxing on the beaches of Jericoacoara, our platform helps you make the most of your travel experience with optimized routes and up-to-date information.

steps.title: Search for a City
steps.description: Enter the name of the city you want to visit in the search bar above.

steps.title: Get Your Itinerary
steps.description: We'll instantly generate a personalized itinerary with the top tourist attractions and points of interest.

steps.title: Explore and Plan
steps.description: View detailed information about each location, including ratings, addresses, and photos.

destinations.title: Popular Destinations
destinations.description: Explore travel guides for the most visited cities in the world. From European capitals to paradisiacal beaches, we have complete itineraries for you.
